name: Dodge This
description:
TPP shooter western where character can't move, only move body to avoid hits and control his bullets. Enemies also have dance to dodge move and can have body armor to bounce bullets. Head shot and torso shoot do more damages.  Its endless shooter for best score.

Game for Game Maker's toolkit Jam 20018

Steering

LMB-shoot

RMB-return to view form character perspective

WSAD+QE+C+Space - move character

Esc -pause menu

Enjoy :)
